info.description:
==========================
Sale Payment Term Security
==========================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

    :alt: Beta
.. |badge2| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/licence-AGPL--3-blue.png

    :alt: Translate me on Weblate
.. |badge5| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/runbot-Try%20me-875A7B.png

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3| |badge4| |badge5| 

In sale orders, payment terms can only be managed when the user has permission "Enable to manage payment terms".

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Configuration
=============

To use this module, you need to:

Go to Settings > Users & Companies > Users (edit your user) > Set "Enable to manage payment terms" option.

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/account-payment/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/account-payment/issues/new?body=module:%20sale_payment_term_security%0Aversion:%2015.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
